content.body: Patrick Luthi confirmed the nameservers for `tc39.es` have been updated touse the unmetered `freedns1.registrar-servers.com`.  I think TTLs may mean it will be 24 hours to take effect.
content.formatted_body: Patrick Luthi confirmed the nameservers for tc39.es have been updated touse the unmetered freedns1.registrar-servers.com. I think TTLs may mean it will be 24 hours to take effect.

content.body: looking good, all five nameservers appear with all A records for GH

> <@robpalme:matrix.org> Patrick Luthi confirmed the nameservers for `tc39.es` have been updated touse the unmetered `freedns1.registrar-servers.com`.  I think TTLs may mean it will be 24 hours to take effect.

Aki had TTL set to 5 minutes only -- in any case, I asked her to wait a few days before removing her records.  no harm in that
content.formatted_body:
In reply to @robpalme:matrix.org
Patrick Luthi confirmed the nameservers for tc39.es have been updated touse the unmetered freedns1.registrar-servers.com. I think TTLs may mean it will be 24 hours to take effect.
Aki had TTL set to 5 minutes only -- in any case, I asked her to wait a few days before removing her records. no harm in that
